casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gabriel A. FERRARI 277P18-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Gabriel Adrian Ferrari, for Gabriel A. Ferrari. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*253The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of January 2019 by Defendant for Freedom of Information Act to Reveal the Name of the Judges:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
